input: text: Entrepreneurship drives innovation and economic growth. Starting a business requires determination and resilience. Successful entrepreneurs inspire others.
output:
< p> Entrepreneurship drives innovation and economic growth.

This is the main point of your original paragraph.

< p> The process of starting a business involves making early decisions, such as idea validation and market research.

We will highlight key points below:

\ < p> Entrepreneurship drives innovation

Driving innovation is at the core of entrepreneurship. It enables businesses to stay ahead of the competition.

< p> The ability to make tough decisions and take calculated risks is also a key trait of successful entrepreneurs.

We will elaborate on this point later in our analysis.

< p> Economic growth

Entrepreneurship is closely tied to economic growth. By creating new jobs and stimulating economic activity, businesses can contribute to overall economic well-being.
